text:
Ramón Luis Conde Román (December 29, 1934 – February 23, 2020) was an American professional baseball player from Puerto Rico. He played as a third baseman. He played 14 games in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Chicago White Sox in 1962. He had a much larger minor league baseball career.
Conde was born in Juana Díaz. He died of a heart attack on February 23, 2020 in West Palm Beach, Florida. He was 85.
